reviewText: Is a wonderfull DVD, Claudio Abbado with the Berliner Philharmoniker was incredible. Mirella Freni, Christine Schafer and Marcelo Alvarez sing lovely, and of course  Simon Keenlyside with his wonderfull voice and personality.  Love it.
"La ci darem la mano" by Schafer and Keenlyside is very good !  I would like to see Zerlina sung by Schafer.
